name: bubble-attack
description: BUBBLE ATTACK - Platform 3D con fisica avanzata ispirato a Bubble Bobble

scripts.build:www: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www && cp index.html www/ && cp -r src www/ && cp -r data www/ && cp -r assets www/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.ios: npm run build:www && npx cap sync ios && npx cap open ios
scripts.ios:run: npm run build:www && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.android: npm run build:www && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.sync: npm run build:www && npx cap sync
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:www && firebase deploy --only hosting

author: Salvatore Izzo
